episode.title: Remote From WWDC 2021
episode.rawTitle: 316: Remote From WWDC 2021 With Craig Federighi and Greg Joswiak
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guests Craig Federighi and Greg Joswiak join me to discuss the news from WWDC 2021: the all-new multitasking interface in iPadOS 15, on-device Siri, new privacy controls in Safari and Mail, MacOS 12 Monterey, and more.
